author: Darren Bernhardt
title: How the Spanish flu compares to COVID-19: Lessons learned, answers still being pursued
description: The learned experiences from a devastating flu pandemic 100 years that staggered the world doesn't make it any easier this time around, says a historian and author who specializes in health and infectious disease.
content:
The learned experiences from a devastating flu pandemic 100 years that staggered the world don't make it any easier this time around, says a historian and author who specializes in health and infectious disease.
